name: mat4900
text: Sounds like a good musical.

name: dusty
text: I feel like the musical is such a ludicrous and fundamentally misguided form of art that only one that has a terrible and laughable concept, and one that is so on accident, not on purpose in some attempt to be ironic, could in any way ever be good.

name: flynn
text: Optimism is not filling.

name: fielding
text: Hm.  I didn't eat lunch.  I'll just have to order two.

name: dusty
text: And yet terror is

name: roastbeet
text: Achewood is my mental diaper

name: centipede_damascus
text: I don't think you fully understand the concept of whar a diaper is and is used for.

name: roastbeet
text: Achewood absorbs excess stress, preventing unseemly outbursts. It also makes me feel confident and look cool.

name: stuart
text: Nothing makes you feel confident and cool more than a diaper

name: dusty
text: That's why the seen in dances with wolves where the guy pisses himself was quoted so much. Oh wait, I'm thinking of the scene in terminator where he rammed a car into the police station. I don't know how I confused the two. If only you all could watch the movie made up of half rememberings of those two films mixed together that exists somewhere in the back of my mind.

name: semiquaver
text: Chubbied for "unseemly outbursts."

name: njury
text: Chubbied for excellent reply.

name: soticoto
text: Is this on account of chubbies making unseemly outbursts?

name: never_die
text: ray is a thinking man.

name: theloneliestmonkey
text: A comment left by theloneliestmonkey was marked lame too many times and excluded. (marked lame by Tinhand, apocowarg, mattbeetee, mercuri0us, scrumpton, farqussus)

name: qwerty
text: You mean nappy

name: sp1derbaby
text: "There is no bathroom!" screamed the furious Austrian.

name: i_love_kate
text: ...Hitler?

name: fattypneumonia
text: "There is no spoon," opined Neo.

name: dtuba
text: "There is no dog...is there?" - Bob Arctor

name: lolsworth
text: Technically "nappy" is short for "napkin", but no-one refers to the infant shit hammock by the latter name except such as Johnson and Johnson when they sell unguents and salves for "napkin rash".

name: tinhand
text:
I like how Rays pose is the same in panels 5 and 6, completely lost in thought.
And how do you decide to 'have optimism'?

name: foolio
text: That blank expression is his way of granting Waterbury leisure for a walk in the garden.

name: fattypneumonia
text:
Ray didn't hear him at all. He's lost in deep thought about his character's optimism, or lack thereof. Timingwise, I think about 15 seconds elapses wherein Ray doesn't move from his "Rodin's Thinker" position he holds in panels 5 & 6.

Waterbury, being a gentleman, lets himself out.

name: scorpio_nadir
text: Rebuttle: it is an endless loop.

name: boredom_man
text: You start with having despair, and seeking a solution that does not require having confidence.

name: rubber_baron
text: Ray thinks that it is rad to have optimism.

name: littlefatdog
text: Ray's just such a creator

name: professoryes
text: Waterbury is already a delightful replication of Jeeves, but his grudging assistance listening to Ray's piece of work only fortifies that image in my mind.

name: estutius
text: Steak On: Apply directly to the steak.

name: mattylite
text: Damnit, Steak On, your commercials are annoying, but your product is incredible.

name: laserblade
text: To the foresteak.  Ha ha... eew.

name: rowboat
text: Ray is basically Elton John without Bernie Taupin.

name: johnnybaverage
text: I joined this site specifically so I could chubby this comment. It's pretty much the truest thing I have ever read.

name: shitsmeller
text: The truest thing you ever read is a short story about me boning your mom last night. I hope this information is useful.

name: notcool
text:
I thought the truest thing was that your face was most muppet-like?

(Not that I've ever played the game. abcd alt-255)

name: johnnybaverage
text: KNOW THAT YOU, TOO, SHALL KNEEL BEFORE ME, AVATAR!

name: the_stoned_one
text:
Optimisms the Gorilla!!
What? well it makes sense to me
(SO baked right now)

name: mangtastic
text:
I am giving this a "Chubby", for you for typing something that you kind of sort of know that probably isn't quite as funny as maybe you think but you don't CARE because you are baked and you are going to hit Post anyway god damnit!

YEAH!

name: xiaomimi
text:
Today's Blogs

Ray: Cooking Class
Philippe: No one should have guns!
Onstad: Earth Zombie

name: sleepyhead
text: Ray's mental diapers are suprising pleasent

name: perilon
text: It's sort of a shame that we don't much see Ray at the piano anymore these days, as he is depicted here.   The greatest achievement of his record label (Sugar Loadzz, the guys who compare their junk to dog food) can't really hold a candle to his actual talent at the piano, which got him started in the music biz in the first place.

name: stubob
text: Ray does a lot of steaking in this arc. Yum!
